item.description:
Wine & Dine

Thursday, Sept. 13th, 6:30 pm.

  • 865 Second St Manchester, NH

  • (603) 625-9463 http://www.unwined.net/ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    LET'S GET TOGETHER FOR FUN AND FONDUE!

  • Co-host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net  This is Laura's event. Steve Ob1 is just going. Steve & Laura would like for you all to join us.
  • Host : Laura T.  wrote:

    This will be a leisurely wining and dining experience. Scott from Unwined has agreed to let us each get separate checks but, in exchange, we need to be patient and allow the wait staff to work at their own pace to accommodate us. So I agreed that we would be patient in exchange for not having the hassle of trying to break down one big check. Agreed? : )

    The relaxed and sumptuous atmosphere at UnWine'd is always a pleasure.  Coincidentally, if you happen to be female, the following discounts apply from 4:30-10:00pm:

  • - 20% off all drinks
    - 50% off all fondues
    - 20% off all entrees

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Wine & Dine at Unwined
